item.title: Social Security seems much less secure 100 days into Trump’s second term
item.description: In retrospectives of Trump’s first months back in the White House, this short phrase is going to be much more than a footnote.

item.title: As Apple reports earnings, here’s why $200 is a key stock price to watch
item.description: With shares trading just above a key support level, investors will be alert for clues about Apple’s manufacturing plans.

item.title: Americans boosted spending last month — but mainly to avoid tariff price increases
item.description: Consumer spending climbs 0.7% in March. Auto sales surge.

item.title: Inflation slowed in March — but that was before trade wars threatened to raise prices
item.description: PCE shows inflation rate decelerating to 2.3%
